verses.name: Luke 4:41
verses.text: And devils also came out of many, crying out, and saying, Thou art Christ the Son of God. And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak: for they knew that he was Christ.

verses.name: Luke 4:42
verses.text: And when it was day, he departed and went into a desert place: and the people sought him, and came unto him, and stayed him, that he should not depart from them.

verses.name: Luke 4:43
verses.text: And he said unto them, I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also: for therefore am I sent.

verses.name: Luke 4:44
verses.text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee.
